heading: HB00449
0: AN ACT CREATING THE DEPARTMENT OF HOUSING, PLANNING AND URBAN DEVELOPMENT, DEFINING ITS MANDATES, POWERS AND FUNCTIONS, PROVIDING THEREFOR AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
short-title: Department Of Housing And Urban Development Act
mother-bill statusstatus: Republic Act RA11201 enacted on 2019-02-14 Substituted by HB06775
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00449
FULL TITLE : AN ACT CREATING THE DEPARTMENT OF HOUSING, PLANNING AND URBAN DEVELOPMENT, DEFINING ITS MANDATES, POWERS AND FUNCTIONS, PROVIDING THEREFOR AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
SHORT TITLE : Department Of Housing And Urban Development Act
ABSTRACT : Aims to consolidate, rationalize and coordinate the functions and powers of the National Home Mortgage Finance Corporation (NHMFC), Home Guarantee Corporation (HGC), Home Development Mutual Fund (HMDF)
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : BELMONTE, JOSE CHRISTOPHER Y.
DATE FILED : 2016-06-30
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Reform
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Nieto (022 2016-09-14)2. Villarin (061 2017-01-24)
3. Villarica (091 2017-05-17)4. Dalipe (096 2017-05-30)
5. De Venecia (002 2017-07-25)6. Olivarez (010 2017-08-14)
7. Suansing (E.) (010 2017-08-14)8. Bordado (014 2017-08-23)
9. Manalo (017 2017-09-04)10. Primicias-Agabas (020 2017-09-07)
11. Belmonte (R.) (027 2017-09-20)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Under deliberation by the Mother Committee on 2017-01-25
          -Created a Technical Working Group
      2. Under study by the Technical Working Group(TWG) on 2017-03-13
      3. Scheduled for meeting/hearing on 2017-10-03
      4. Approved by the Committee on Appropriations on 2017-10-03
          -Substitute Bill to House Bills Numbered 449, 1518, 1721, 3375, 3639 and 5114 was approved with amendments.
MOTHER BILL: HB06775
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON GOVERNMENT REORGANIZATION ON 2016-07-26
SECONDARILY REFERRED TO THE COMMITTEE(S) ON HOUSING AND URBAN DEVELOPMENT
